definitions.title: n. pr. m.
definitions.body: ´[[בְּנֵי ס]] Ezr 2:35 = Ne 7:38, ´[[בְּנֵי הַסּ]] Ne 3:3; LXX Saana, Sanana(t), etc., LXXL Sennaa; Mey:Judenth. 150, 154 rds. [[סְנֻאָה]] (´[[ס]] for ´[[שׂ]], cf. [[סְנוּאָה]]) = sons of the hated (rejected) woman, i.e. the poorer classes of Jerusalem.
